artifacts.content:
{
  "mvp_definition": {
    "core_value_proposition": "A comprehensive build dashboard for developers to monitor and understand the progress of their OLYMPUS builds",
    "target_user": "Power users and developers who need visibility into their build process",
    "key_differentiator": "Provides real-time status updates, detailed phase progression, and explainable AI decisions - unlike generic CI/CD dashboards"
  },
  "mvp_features": [
    {
      "id": "build_list",
      "name": "Build List",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 90,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 9,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "A list of all active and completed builds with status indicators",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to see a list of my builds so that I can monitor their progress"
    },
    {
      "id": "phase_progression",
      "name": "Phase Progression",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 88,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 9,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "A visual timeline showing the status of each build phase",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to see the current stage of my build so that I can understand where it's at"
    },
    {
      "id": "agent_roster",
      "name": "Agent Roster",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 85,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "A list of all agents involved in the build, their roles, and current status",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to see who is working on my build so that I can understand the process"
    },
    {
      "id": "constitutional_status",
      "name": "Constitutional Status",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 87,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 6
      },
      "description": "A traffic light system showing the compliance status of key constitutional checks",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to know if my build is following the OLYMPUS constitution so that I can trust the process"
    },
    {
      "id": "understanding_panel",
      "name": "Understanding Your Build",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 85,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "A panel that explains what was built, why it was built that way, and known risks",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to understand the reasoning behind my build so that I can trust and maintain it"
    },
    {
      "id": "contextual_chat",
      "name": "Contextual Chat",
      "category": "supporting",
      "priority": "should_have",
      "rice_score": 75,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 7,
        "impact": 7,
        "confidence": 7,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "A collapsible side panel that allows asking questions about the current build",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to be able to ask questions about my build so that I can get more information"
    }
  ],
  "roadmap": {
    "phase_1_mvp": {
      "duration": "3-4 weeks",
      "features": [
        "build_list",
        "phase_progression",
        "agent_roster",
        "constitutional_status",
        "understanding_panel"
      ],
      "milestone": "Fully functional build dashboard"
    },
    "phase_2_enhance": {
      "duration": "2-3 weeks",
      "features": [
        "contextual_chat"
      ],
      "milestone": "Added support for user interaction"
    },
    "phase_3_scale": {
      "duration": "ongoing",
      "features": [],
      "milestone": "Continuous improvements and feature additions"
    }
  },
  "technical_requirements": {
    "stack": {
      "frontend": "Next.js 14 + React 18 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS",
      "backend": "Next.js API Routes",
      "database": "Supabase for build data",
      "auth": "Supabase Auth"
    },
    "integrations": [
      "Supabase for build data and real-time updates",
      "Lucide React for icons"
    ],
    "performance": {
      "initial_load": "<2s",
      "interaction_response": "<500ms",
      "lighthouse_target": ">90"
    },
    "security": [
      "HTTPS",
      "JWT tokens for API access",
      "Input sanitization"
    ]
  },
  "success_criteria": {
    "launch_requirements": [
      "All critical features functional",
      "No TypeScript errors",
      "Responsive on desktop",
      "Core user flows completable end-to-end",
      "Build data wired to Supabase"
    ],
    "validation_metrics": [
      "Users can complete primary tasks (view build status, understand decisions) in <2 minutes",
      "Zero critical bugs in core flows",
      "Positive user feedback on clarity and usefulness"
    ]
  },
  "featureChecklist": {
    "critical": [
      {
        "id": "build_list",
        "name": "Build List",
        "description": "A list of all active and completed builds with status indicators",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a table with columns for: build ID, status (queued/running/completed/failed), start time, end time, duration",
          "Status is indicated with a colored icon (green/yellow/red)",
          "Clicking a row opens the individual build detail view",
          "Empty state shows 'No builds found' message"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 1,
        "rice_score": 90
      },
      {
        "id": "phase_progression",
        "name": "Phase Progression",
        "description": "A visual timeline showing the status of each build phase",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a horizontal timeline with phases: discovery, design, architecture, frontend, backend, integration, testing, deployment",
          "Each phase shows its status (pending/active/completed/failed) and a brief explanation",
          "Phases are color-coded (green/yellow/red) based on status",
          "Hovering on a phase shows the start and end times"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 2,
        "rice_score": 88
      },
      {
        "id": "agent_roster",
        "name": "Agent Roster",
        "description": "A list of all agents involved in the build, their roles, and current status",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a table with columns for: agent name, role, status (idle/working/completed/failed), current task",
          "Agents are grouped by build phase",
          "Status is indicated with a colored icon (green/yellow/red)",
          "Clicking an agent row opens a modal with more details"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 3,
        "rice_score": 85
      },
      {
        "id": "constitutional_status",
        "name": "Constitutional Status",
        "description": "A traffic light system showing the compliance status of key constitutional checks",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays up to 7 constitutional checks (as defined in the requirements)",
          "Each check shows the article name, status (compliant/warning/violation), and a one-sentence explanation",
          "Status is indicated with a colored icon (green/yellow/red)",
          "Clicking a check row opens a modal with more details"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 4,
        "rice_score": 87
      },
      {
        "id": "understanding_panel",
        "name": "Understanding Your Build",
        "description": "A panel that explains what was built, why it was built that way, and known risks",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays three sections: 'What was built', 'Why it was built this way', 'Known risks'",
          "'What was built' lists the generated components and files",
          "'Why it was built this way' explains the key decisions and reasoning",
          "'Known risks' lists identified risks and their mitigation status"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 5,
        "rice_score": 85
      }
    ],
    "important": [
      {
        "id": "contextual_chat",
        "name": "Contextual Chat",
        "description": "A collapsible side panel that allows asking questions about the current build",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Opens as a collapsible side panel when a build is selected",
          "Displays a chat interface with message history",
          "Users can ask questions about the current build",
          "Responses are generated based on the build data and agent information"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 6,
        "rice_score": 75
      }
    ],
    "niceToHave": []
  },
  "risks": [
    {
      "risk": "Integrating with Supabase for real-time build data",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Thoroughly test the Supabase integration, handle edge cases, and implement fallbacks"
    },
    {
      "risk": "Displaying a large number of agents and builds",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "medium",
      "mitigation": "Implement pagination, infinite scrolling, and performance optimizations"
    },
    {
      "risk": "Generating accurate explanations for build decisions",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Work closely with the ORACLE and EMPATHY agents to ensure the explanations are clear and useful"
    }
  ]
}

decisions.reasoning: The dashboard has a straightforward set of features, making it suitable for a monolithic architecture. This minimizes complexity during the MVP phase, allowing for quicker iterations and easier deployment.
